attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/magazine-14572216

Gas prices are crippling families, thanks to sheer profiteering from the energy companies.

Over 25,000 people DIED because they couldn't heat their homes.

It is disgusting that this isn't a national scandal. And it needs to be fixed.

Nationalise at least one of the gas companies, and turn it into an NHS-style system. Put income tax up a few points to cover the cost, and we're sorted!

Thanks.
